00039 #include "egs_alias_table.h"
00040 #include "egs_functions.h"
00041 
00042 void EGS_AliasTable::clear() {
00043     if( n > 0 ) {
00044         delete [] fi; delete [] xi; delete [] wi; delete [] bin; n = 0;
00045     }
00046 }
00047 
00048 void EGS_AliasTable::allocate(int N, int Type) {
00049     clear();
00050     n = N; type = Type; xi = new EGS_Float [n];
00051     if( type == 0 ) {
00052         np = n;
00053         fi = new EGS_Float [n]; wi = new EGS_Float [n]; bin = new int [n];
00054     }
00055     else {
00056         np = n-1;
00057         wi = new EGS_Float [n-1]; bin = new int [n-1];
00058         if( type == 1 ) fi = new EGS_Float [n-1];
00059         else fi = new EGS_Float [n];
00060     }
00061 }
00062 
00063 
00064 void EGS_AliasTable::copy(const EGS_AliasTable &t) {
00065     clear();
00066     if( t.n > 0 ) {
00067         allocate(t.n,t.type);
00068         for(int j=0; j<np; j++) {
00069             xi[j] = t.xi[j]; fi[j] = t.fi[j];
00070             wi[j] = t.wi[j]; bin[j] = t.bin[j];
00071         }
00072         if( type ) {
00073             xi[np] = t.xi[np]; if( type == 2 || type == 3) fi[np] = t.fi[np];
00074         }
00075     }
00076 }
00077 
00078 /**************************************************
00079       Initializes alias-table:
00080       N = number of abscissa points
00081 **************************************************/
00082 void EGS_AliasTable::initialize(int N, const EGS_Float *x,
00083         const EGS_Float *f, int Type) {
00084     allocate(N,Type);
00085     for(int i=0; i<np; i++) { xi[i] = x[i]; fi[i] = f[i]; }
00086     if( Type ) xi[np] = x[np];
00087     if( Type == 2 || Type == 3) fi[np] = f[np];
00088     make();
00089 }
00090 
00091 void EGS_AliasTable::make() {
00092     EGS_Float *fcum = new EGS_Float[np]; bool *not_done = new bool[np];
00093     EGS_Float sum = 0, sum1 = 0; int i;
00094     for(i=0; i<np; i++) {
00095         if( type == 0 ) fcum[i] = fi[i];
00096         else if( type == 1 ) fcum[i] = fi[i]*(xi[i+1]-xi[i]);
00097         else fcum[i] = 0.5*(fi[i]+fi[i+1])*(xi[i+1]-xi[i]);
00098         //egsWarning("i=%d fcum=%g x=%g f=%g\n",i,fcum[i],xi[i],fi[i]);
00099         sum += fcum[i]; wi[i] = 1; bin[i] = 0;
00100         not_done[i] = true; wi[i] = 1;
00101         if( type == 0 ) sum1 += fcum[i]*xi[i];
00102         else if( type == 1 ) sum1 += 0.5*fcum[i]*(xi[i+1]+xi[i]);
00103         else sum1 += fcum[i]*(fi[i]*(2*xi[i]+xi[i+1])+
00104                 fi[i+1]*(xi[i]+2*xi[i+1]))/(3*(fi[i]+fi[i+1]));
00105     }
00106     average = sum1/sum;
00107     for(i=0; i<np; i++) fi[i] /= sum;
00108     if( type == 2 || type == 3) fi[np] /= sum;
00109     sum /= np;  int jh, jl;
00110     //egsWarning("np = %d sum = %g average = %g\n",np,sum,average);
00111     for(i=0; i<np-1; i++) {
00112         for(jh=0; jh<np-1; jh++) {
00113             if(not_done[jh] && fcum[jh] > sum) break;
00114         }
00115         for(jl=0; jl<np-1; jl++) {
00116             if(not_done[jl] && fcum[jl] < sum) break;
00117         }
00118         //egsWarning(" fcum[%d] = %g fcum[%d] = %g\n",jh,fcum[jh],jl,fcum[jl]);
00119         EGS_Float aux = sum - fcum[jl];
00120         fcum[jh] -= aux; not_done[jl] = false;
00121         wi[jl] = fcum[jl]/sum; bin[jl] = jh;
00122         //egsWarning(" for %d wi = %g jh = %d\n",jl,wi[jl],bin[jl]);
00123     }
00124     delete [] fcum; delete [] not_done;
00125 }
00126 
00127 #define AT_NCHECK 3
00128 
00129 int EGS_AliasTable::initialize(EGS_Float xmin, EGS_Float xmax, EGS_Float accu,
00130         int nmax, EGS_AtFunction f, void *data) {
00131     allocate(2,2);
00132     xi[0] = xmin; xi[1] = xmax; fi[0] = f(xi[0],data); fi[1] = f(xi[1],data);
00133     EGS_Float *xtemp, *ftemp; int error = 0;
00134     while(1) {
00135         int nnn = (n-1)*AT_NCHECK + n;
00136         xtemp = new EGS_Float[nnn]; ftemp = new EGS_Float[nnn];
00137         if( !xtemp || !ftemp ) egsFatal("EGS_AliasTable::initialize: "
00138                 "not enough memory!\n");
00139         bool is_ok = true; int i,j=0;
00140         for(i=0; i<n-1; i++) {
00141             xtemp[j] = xi[i]; ftemp[j] = fi[i];
00142             EGS_Float dx = (xi[i+1]-xi[i])/(AT_NCHECK+1);
00143             for(int l=0; l<AT_NCHECK; l++) {
00144                 EGS_Float x = xi[i]+dx*(l+1);
00145                 EGS_Float fe = f(x,data);
00146                 EGS_Float fa = fi[i]+(fi[i+1]-fi[i])/(xi[i+1]-xi[i])*(x-xi[i]);
00147                 EGS_Float test = fabs(fa/fe-1);
00148                 if( test > accu ) {
00149                     is_ok = false; xtemp[++j] = x; ftemp[j] = fe;
00150                 }
00151             }
00152             j++;
00153         }
00154         if( is_ok ) break;
00155         xtemp[j] = xi[n-1]; ftemp[j++] = fi[n-1];
00156         allocate(j,2);
00157         for(i=0; i<j; i++) { xi[i] = xtemp[i]; fi[i] = ftemp[i]; }
00158         if( n >= nmax ) { error = 1; break; }
00159         delete [] xtemp; delete [] ftemp;
00160     }
00161     delete [] xtemp; delete [] ftemp;
00162     make();
00163     return error;
00164 }
00165 
00166 int EGS_AliasTable::sampleBin(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) const {
00167     EGS_Float r1 = rndm->getUniform();
00168     EGS_Float aj = r1*np; int j = (int) aj; aj -= j;
00169     if( aj > wi[j] ) j = bin[j];
00170     return j;
00171 }
00172 
00173 EGS_Float EGS_AliasTable::sample(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) const {
00174     EGS_Float r1 = rndm->getUniform();
00175     EGS_Float aj = r1*np; int j = (int) aj; aj -= j;
00176     if( aj > wi[j] ) j = bin[j];
00177     if( !type ) return xi[j];
00178     EGS_Float x = xi[j]; EGS_Float dx = xi[j+1] - x;
00179     EGS_Float r2 = rndm->getUniform();
00180     if( type == 1 ) return x + dx*r2;
00181     EGS_Float res;
00182     if( fi[j] > 0 ) {
00183         EGS_Float a = fi[j+1]/fi[j]-1;
00184         if( fabs(a) < 0.2 ) {
00185             EGS_Float rnno1 = 0.5*(1-r2)*a; res = x + r2*dx*(1+rnno1*(1-r2*a));
00186         }
00187         else res = x - dx/a*(1-sqrt(1+r2*a*(2+a)));
00188     }
00189     else res = x + dx*sqrt(r2);
00190     return res;
00191 }
00192 
00193 EGS_SimpleAliasTable::EGS_SimpleAliasTable(int N, const EGS_Float *f) : n(0) {
00194     if( N < 1 ) return;
00195     n = N;
00196     wi = new EGS_Float [n]; bins = new int [n]; int i;
00197     double sum = 0; double *fcum = new double [n];
00198     for(i=0; i<n; ++i) { fcum[i] = f[i]; sum += fcum[i]; bins[i] = n+1; }
00199     sum /= n; int jh, jl;
00200     //egsInformation("n=%d sum=%g\n",n,sum);
00201     int jh_old = 0, jl_old = 0;
00202     for(i=0; i<n-1; ++i) {
00203         for(jh=jh_old; jh<n-1; jh++) {
00204             if( bins[jh] > n && fcum[jh] > sum ) break;
00205         }
00206         if( fcum[jh_old] < sum && jh_old < jl_old ) jl = jh_old;
00207         else {
00208             for(jl=jl_old; jl<n-1; jl++) {
00209                 if( bins[jl] > n && fcum[jl] < sum ) break;
00210             }
00211             jl_old = jl;
00212         }
00213         double aux = sum - fcum[jl];
00214         fcum[jh] -= aux;
00215         wi[jl] = fcum[jl]/sum; bins[jl] = jh;
00216         //egsInformation("i=%d jh=%d jl=%d w=%g\n",i,jh,jl,wi[jl]);
00217         jh_old = jh; //jl_old = jl;
00218     }
00219     for(i=0; i<n; ++i) {
00220         if( bins[i] > n ) { bins[i] = i; wi[i] = 1; }
00221         //egsInformation("alias table: %d %d %g\n",i,bins[i],wi[i]);
00222     }
00223     delete [] fcum;
00224 }
00225 
00226 EGS_SimpleAliasTable::~EGS_SimpleAliasTable() {
00227     if( n > 0 ) { delete [] wi; delete [] bins; }
00228 }
